v-model:current.description: Specify the current step, starting with 0. In the child step element, the state can be overridden via the 'status' attribute, and v-model is supported after 1.5.0
v-model:current.description_zh: 指定当前步骤，从 0 开始记数。在子 Step 元素中，可以通过 `status` 属性覆盖状态, 1.5.0 后支持 v-model

direction.description: Specify the step bar orientation. Currently, two orientations are supported: horizontal ('horizontal') and vertical ('vertical').
direction.description_zh: 指定步骤条方向。目前支持水平（`horizontal`）和竖直（`vertical`）两种方向

:initial.description: The starting sequence number, starting from 0
:initial.description_zh: 起始序号，从 0 开始记数

labelPlacement.description: Specify the position of the label, the default is to the right of the icon horizontally, and optionally 'vertical' to the bottom of the icon
labelPlacement.description_zh: 指定标签放置位置，默认水平放图标右侧，可选`vertical`放图标下方

:percent.description: Progress bar progress displayed by the current 'process' step (only for basic type Steps)
:percent.description_zh: 当前 `process` 步骤显示的进度条进度（只对基本类型的 Steps 生效）

:progressDot.description: A dotted step bar, which can be set to a scoped slot, and labelPlacement will be forced to vertical
:progressDot.type: Boolean or v-slot:progressDot="{index, status, title, description, prefixCls, iconDot}"
:progressDot.description_zh: 点状步骤条，可以设置为一个 作用域插槽,labelPlacement 将强制为vertical

responsive.description: Automatically changes to vertical mode when the screen width is less than 532px
responsive.description_zh: 当屏幕宽度小于 532px 时自动变为垂直模式

size.description: Specify the size, currently supports normal ('default') and mini ('small')
size.description_zh: 指定大小，目前支持普通（`default`）和迷你（`small`）

status.description: Specify the status of the current step, optionally 'wait', 'process', 'finish' error
status.description_zh: 指定当前步骤的状态，可选 `wait` `process` `finish` error

type.description: There are two types of step bars: 'default' and 'navigation'
type.description_zh: 步骤条类型，有 `default` 和 `navigation` 两种

:items.description: Configure tab content, 'icon' subtitle is not supported
:items.description_zh: 配置选项卡内容，不支持 `icon` subtitle

:current.description: Specify the current step, starting with 0. In child step elements, the status can be overridden by the 'status' attribute
:current.description_zh: 指定当前步骤，从 0 开始记数。在子 Step 元素中，可以通过 `status` 属性覆盖状态

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when you click to switch steps

StepItem.name: status
StepItem.description: item 指定状态。当不配置该属性时，会使用 Steps 的 `current` 来自动指定状态。可选：`wait` `process` `finish` error
